alert.note: Alert for Motherlode; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 11:55AM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern El Dorado, central Placer and central Nevada Counties through 100 PM PDT... At 1154 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Colfax to near Applegate to near Greenwood. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and accumulating pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail covered roads possible including the I-80 corridor. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baxter, Colfax, Greenwood, Sugar Pine, Iowa Hill, Garden Valley, Applegate, Scotts Flat, Chiquita Lake, White Cloud Campground, Foresthill, Weimar, Georgetown, Alta Sierra and Meadow Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Motherlode; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada
